description: This file defines the React component 'NoteEditor', which provides an interface for creating, editing, viewing, and managing notes within a notes application. It handles user input, state management for edit mode and note fields, and exposes callbacks for saving, adding, and changing notes.

methods.name: NoteEditor({ selectedNote, onSave, onAdd, onChange, isNew })
methods.description: React functional component for editing and viewing notes, manages local state and user interactions.

ctags.name: NoteEditor
ctags.pattern: /^function NoteEditor({ selectedNote, onSave, onAdd, onChange, isNew }) {$/
